articles.title: American owner set to lose billions on Boots sale - The Telegraph
articles.description: Walgreens could get far less than it hoped for the chemist chain
articles.content:
The American owner of Boots risks losing billions after the one-time favourite to buy the chemist chain valued the retailer at a steep discount.
